entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Halton Hills
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:41 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 30 this morning and minus 23 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness near midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023
